document_data.name: Throat Leech
document_data.mainbody: The '''throat leech''' was a deadly [[parasite|parasitic]] species of [[leech]] that could be found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: Throat leeches resembled small wooden twigs about {{SI|1|in|c|long=yes}} long or smaller.

Ecology.Habitats:
Throat leeches thrived in bodies of fresh water.

In [[Faer√ªn]] throat leeches were primarily known to inhabit the High Moor, as well as the [[Dragon Reach]].

Throat leeches could also be found in the swamps and rivers of [[Chult]]

document_data.History:
In the late 14{{th}} century DR, [[Ravens Bluff]] resident [[Skully]] sometimes sought out and purchased throat leeches. He secretly offered these for sale at his shop, [[Skully's Bar and Bait]], as highly priced fishing bait.{{Cite polyhedron/46/The Living City: Skully's Bar and Bait|17}}

As of the late 15{{th}} century DR, throat leeches were one of the more pervasive disease risks in the jungles of Chult.
